headline: ExxonMobil to Release Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: SPRING, Texas, October 13, 2025--Exxon Mobil Corporation (NYSE: XOM) will release its third quarter 2025 financial results on Friday, October 31, 2025. The company will issue a press release via Business Wire that will be available at 5:30 a.m. CT at investor.exxonmobil.com.

headline: What ExxonMobil's Comeback in Iraq Really Means
summary: The U.S. oil giant’s comeback will center on developing the supergiant Majnoon oil field.
